content: Command Purpose Example codex Interactive REPL codex codex "…" Initial prompt for interactive REPL codex "fix lint errors" codex -q "…" Non‑interactive "quiet mode" codex -q --json "explain utils.ts" codex completion <bash|zsh|fish> Print shell completion script codex completion bash Key flags: --model/-m , --approval-mode/-a , and --quiet/-q .
